description.value:
A small white gem, gleaming like fresh dew. One of the hardest nonmagical substances in the world.

This is used as the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.rmliJsYc0Loo3Jgt]{Raise Dead} spell, which cannot be cast unless this component is carried by the caster. Alternatively, it might be part of the material component of a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.bjDebvXFbxqEYkw6]{True Resurrection} spell.

This component is consumed by casting the Raise Dead spell.

This diamond can be crushed into diamond dust over 1 hour using smith's or tinker's tools. You get the equivalent of 1 bag of diamond dust, valued at 100 gold.
